instruction: Describe a unique recipe and provide cooking instructions.
output: This recipe is for a delicious and unique dish of Sweet Potato and Basil Lasagna. First, preheat the oven to 350°F. Slice 2 sweet potatoes into thin strips and place them into a casserole dish. Sauté 1 onion and 3 cloves of garlic in a pan over medium heat for about 5 minutes. Add 1 cup of strained tomatoes, 1 teaspoon of salt, 1 tablespoon of oregano, and 1 tablespoon of basil to the pan, and cook for a few more minutes. Spread half of the sauce on top of the sweet potatoes. Place 1 cup of ricotta cheese, 1/4 cup of grated parmesan cheese, and 1/4 cup of chopped fresh basil in a bowl, and mix it together. Spread this mixture on top of the tomato sauce, and then add another layer of sweet potato slices. Top it off with the remaining sauce, 1/4 cup of parmesan cheese, and 1 cup of shredded mozzarella cheese. Bake in the preheated oven for 40-45 minutes. Enjoy!
